Uses of Interface
org.apache.xml.dtm.ref.IncrementalSAXSource

  • Packages that use IncrementalSAXSource 
    Package Description
    org.apache.xml.dtm.ref  
    org.apache.xml.dtm.ref.dom2dtm  
    org.apache.xml.dtm.ref.sax2dtm  

    • Uses of IncrementalSAXSource in org.apache.xml.dtm.ref

      Classes in org.apache.xml.dtm.ref that implement IncrementalSAXSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IncrementalSAXSource_Filter
      IncrementalSAXSource_Filter implements IncrementalSAXSource, using a standard SAX2 event source as its input and parcelling out those events gradually in reponse to deliverMoreNodes() requests.
      class  IncrementalSAXSource_Xerces
      IncrementalSAXSource_Xerces takes advantage of the fact that Xerces1 incremental mode is already a coroutine of sorts, and just wraps our IncrementalSAXSource API around it.
      Methods in org.apache.xml.dtm.ref that return IncrementalSAXSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IncrementalSAXSource IncrementalSAXSource_Xerces.createIncrementalSAXSource() 
      static IncrementalSAXSource IncrementalSAXSource_Filter.createIncrementalSAXSource(CoroutineManager co, int controllerCoroutineID) 
      static IncrementalSAXSource IncrementalSAXSource_Xerces.createIncrementalSAXSource(org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser parser) 
      Methods in org.apache.xml.dtm.ref with parameters of type IncrementalSAXSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DTMDocumentImpl.setIncrementalSAXSource(IncrementalSAXSource source)
      Bind a IncrementalSAXSource to this DTM.
